mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "orderId", a.community_name AS "communityName", a.build_number AS "buildNumber", a.build_unit AS "buildUnit", a.build_room AS "buildRoom", ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM biz_qc_bill b WHERE a.id = b.order_id AND b.qc_bill_type = '1' AND b.`status` > 2 AND b.id NOT IN ( SELECT c.business_id_int FROM biz_business_view_log c WHERE c.business_id_int = b.id AND c.business_type = '3' ) ) AS "number" FROM biz_order a WHERE a.customer_phone = #{customerPhone} ORDER BY a.create_date ASC

SELECT b.id AS "qcBillId", b.qc_bill_type, b.is_recheck, b.qc_check_node_id, b.check_datetime, g.realName, e.qc_check_node_name, c.id AS "qcBillItemId", c.qc_check_item_id, d.qc_check_item_name, c.is_passed, c.is_warned, c.is_locale_repaire, c.is_limit_date_repaire, c.limit_date, c.limit_date_repaire_check_style, c.is_punish_money, c.punish_money_amount_real, c.pm_punish_score, c.worker_punish_amount, c.worker_punish_score, c.qc_punish_amount, c.qc_punish_score, c.check_style FROM biz_qc_bill b INNER JOIN biz_qc_check_node e ON b.qc_check_node_id = e.id INNER JOIN biz_qc_bill_check_item c ON c.qc_bill_id = b.id LEFT JOIN biz_qc_check_item d ON d.id = c.qc_check_item_id LEFT JOIN biz_employee g ON g.id = b.check_employee_id WHERE b.id in (SELECT DISTINCT(m.qc_bill_id) from biz_qc_bill_check_item m WHERE m.worker_punish_order_taskpackage_id = #{0}) and b.is_recheck = '0' and c.worker_punish_order_taskpackage_id = #{0} and c.worker_punish_amount is not NULL

select a.break_describe as "breakDescribe", a.is_required_remarks as "isRequiredRemarks", a.break_remarks as "breakRemarks" from biz_qc_bill_check_item_break a where a.qc_bill_check_item_id = #{qcBillItemId}

SELECT a.community_name, a.build_number, a.build_unit, a.build_room, b.id AS "qcBillId", b.qc_bill_type, b.is_recheck, b.qc_check_node_id, b.check_datetime, g.realName, e.qc_check_node_name,
IFNULL(m1.picCount,0) AS "picCount", IFNULL(m2.itemCount,0) AS "itemCount", (IFNULL(m2.itemCount,0)-IFNULL(m4.noPassedCount,0)) AS "passedCount", IFNULL(m4.noPassedCount,0) AS "noPassedCount",
c.id AS "qcBillItemId", c.qc_check_item_id, d.qc_check_item_name, c.is_passed FROM biz_qc_bill b INNER JOIN biz_order a ON a.id = b.order_id INNER JOIN biz_qc_check_node e ON b.qc_check_node_id = e.id INNER JOIN biz_qc_bill_check_item c ON c.qc_bill_id = b.id LEFT JOIN biz_qc_check_item d ON d.id = c.qc_check_item_id LEFT JOIN biz_employee g ON g.id = b.check_employee_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT f.business_id_int,COUNT(1) AS "picCount" FROM biz_business_pic f WHERE f.business_id_int = #{0} AND f.business_type = '2' GROUP BY f.business_id_int) m1 ON m1.business_id_int = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT h.qc_bill_id,COUNT(1) AS "itemCount" FROM biz_qc_bill_check_item h WHERE h.qc_bill_id = #{0} GROUP BY h.qc_bill_id) m2 ON m2.qc_bill_id = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT h.qc_bill_id,COUNT(1) AS "noPassedCount" FROM biz_qc_bill_check_item h WHERE h.qc_bill_id = #{0} AND h.is_passed='0' GROUP BY h.qc_bill_id) m4 ON m4.qc_bill_id = b.id
WHERE b.id = #{0}

SELECT c.is_passed, c.is_warned, c.is_locale_repaire, c.is_limit_date_repaire, c.limit_date, c.limit_date_repaire_check_style, c.is_punish_money, c.punish_money_amount_real, c.pm_punish_score, c.worker_punish_amount, c.worker_punish_score, c.qc_punish_amount, c.qc_punish_score, c.check_style, d.break_describe, d.is_required_remarks, d.break_remarks FROM biz_qc_bill_check_item c LEFT JOIN biz_qc_bill_check_item_break d ON c.id = d.qc_bill_check_item_id WHERE c.id = #{0}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_business_view_log( id, business_type, business_id_int, business_id_varchar, business_view_datetime, business_viewer_employee_id, business_viewer_only_mark, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES( #{id}, #{businessType}, #{businessIdInt}, #{businessIdVarchar}, #{businessViewDatetime}, #{businessViewerEmployeeId}, #{businessViewerOnlyMark}, #{remarks}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
